website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Ignite v2 gained positive feedback from many reviewers because of its impressive cushioning and the responsiveness of its components. A lot of them wrote that its mechanisms were durable, and that it was generally comfortable. This road shoe became highly recommended for those who need a reliable running companion.
pros: A lot of consumers used the word ‘comfortable’ to describe the Puma Ignite v2 and their time wearing it
This running shoe’s colorful upper unit was lauded by testers who stated that they made the façade very eye-catching
The flexibility of the platform gained praise because it allowed the runners to move their feet more naturally
The underfoot cushioning system was reliable, according to many testers
Several testers reported that the platform was capable of absorbing impact shock during the landing phase of the gait cycle
The price was affordable, according to runners
Some consumers were able to use this running shoe for a variety of activities, and they said that it didn’t disappoint them in any way
The runners reported that it was true-to-size
cons: Some runners complained that the Puma Ignite v2 was too narrow for their feet
A few runners were disappointed with the shoe’s thin tongue because it didn’t feel comfortable against their skin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size 8 fit.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Very lightweight with plenty of cushion. I think Pumas tend to run a little narrow, but I was impressed how well these fit, especially in the toe box. I really love the sort of rubber coating around the front of the shoe. Seems most of my shoes that have the mesh overlay tend to rip there, but hopefully these won't. I had them in my cart for a few days and the price dropped to about 30 bucks! I couldn't pass that up. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: more fashion than fitness
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars: These feel more like fashion sneakers than joggers, but they are super cute. The interior foot-bed has an odd ribbed texture that could probably be ameliorated by an insert. It's a bit distracting when you're jogging. However- I can wear these to the store post-work out and not feel like a bum. I'll probably go back to Saucony after these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: city mouse country mouse

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but not as soft as v1 (which had a terrible foam bottom that ripped and deteriorated after a month). I have a heel bone spur and was getting shots every four months - I have not experienced any heel pain as long as I wear these shoes in house and out. I can definitely feel the pain coming back if I wear other shoes or no shoes while inside the house
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: On the positive this is a good looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: On the positive this is a good looking sneaker, on the negative the interior sole has a wave design that you can feel and it took me a few to get used to this. The negative is the front flap of the shoe slides across it does not matter how tight I tie my shoelace that pies slides over just slightly then you end up w/the knot of your shoelace on your ankle. You may not notice but for doing Zumba and other moving activity this is bit annoying so I have to watch what days I pull them for the gym. So that I am not distracted in class pulling them into place. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Zhadia

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is slightly small. Go a 1/2 size up. I bought these for my cardio on the (treadmill for 60-70 minutes at 4-4.4 mph at an incline) they are stiff, they also slip on the belt at times. I haven't tried them on an indoor court floor but would caution they probably would be too slippery for any running on basketball or racquet ball courts. For the price they aren't bad and as a casual shoe they are great, but I won't be buying again to use for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: April Boggess

customer_reviews.title: They're OK.. just Ok
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the little bumps inside the shoe. My ankles are skinny, this pair keeps on sliding off if I don't wear socks which are thick enough.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Lorraine Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair...I wore the first pair out. I have toes issues and these shoes do not hurt at all. I can walk in them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except they are really narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much but they are way to narrow and squeeze the front half of my foot. Sadly, I will never be able to wear them
customer_reviews.author: April Diana

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: ordered for my wife, she got bruises under her feet. Not comfortable at all, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With the reviews I have read, I expected them ...
customer_reviews.text: With the reviews I have read, I expected them to be smaller. And yes they are narrower than usual. But this did not bother me, since I wear a size six and my feet are small. They fit around my fit, not just having the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are comfortable without having to break them in. They are very light weight, good support and cushy. Great color too!!!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are too narrow, wearing a few months uppers cracking, poor quality
customer_reviews.author: NIE LEI

customer_reviews.title: Discolored soles
customer_reviews.text: Soles are discolored/yellowed, similar to what other reviewers are saying. It’s a shame because they look pretty comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Katzy619

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I decided give as a gift and she love it!
customer_reviews.author: ZAndujar

customer_reviews.title: but the shoe is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to run a bit small for my feet (and I have small feet in general), but the shoe is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: So cute and cushiony
customer_reviews.text: Air light and oh so comfortable! On my feet over 8 hours a day. After day3..I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Yumookies

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and these shoes feel great on my feet! There is ribbing inside the soles which feels great for walking but not sure I could run for a long period of time in these. I got the Royal blue which goes great with my Cubs wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is perfect for magenta shopping!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and fast delivery. I would have liked a wide shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shoe. Shipped quickly. Good price. Just too narrow for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable and cute, but about half a size too big
customer_reviews.author: Iz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! But unfortunately the soles were yellowed
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The fit is perfect and the colors are so vibrant and fun. Perfect gym shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Beth C.

customer_reviews.title: Bright pink!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers run large! Got my usual size but it is still too large. Nice bright pink color and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: emeraldgreen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I ever get 👍👍👍l am so sad. The shoes start to fall apart I descofer a tear in both pair
customer_reviews.author: A H ALWASSIA

customer_reviews.title: They are ok but not crazy about the colors.
customer_reviews.text: For Royal blue and red shoes these are the most neon orange shoes I have ever seen. The bulk of the shoe is bright orange with some very dark blue laces with a white decoration. They were somewhat large but wearable with thick socks. I can use them as walking shoes but running or jogging are not doable because of potential friction. I will adjust my review if they work better as they are worn longer and I get over the awful color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provides stability and cushion with a springy feedback
customer_reviews.text: I got these for me, but the shoes have a higher arch, which did not match up to where the arch in my foot is, so I couldn't wear them comfortably. However, my daughter wore them to the gym and she loves them. She says the heal provides cushion with a springy feedback the shoes provide comfort padding and stability around the ankle. She loves them for working out or walking/standing for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Caused blisters in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice looking, and the insoles are very comfortable. Withing 5 minutes of exercise I had to quit because I had huge blisters on each foot. There are built in ridges on the heel, and I would asume this is what caused it. I will have to look for a new pair of workout shows now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and very comfortable! I'm a size 9 and these fit just right. Lots of spring and cushion for all-day comfort.
customer_reviews.author: pawleysgirl

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Ignite V2 WN's Running Shoe
feature_bullets: Lace-up flexible running shoe featuring breathable mesh upper with padded collar and low-profile tongue
PU foam for high-rebound and comfort
